com.launchdarkly.client

Class LDClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.launchdarkly.client.LDClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    @ThreadSafe
public class LDClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    A client for the LaunchDarkly API. Client instances are thread-safe. Applications can safely instantiate a single LDClient for the lifetime of their application.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LDClient(LDConfig config)
      Creates a new client to connect to LaunchDarkly with a custom configuration.
      LDClient(java.lang.String apiKey)
      Creates a new client instance that connects to LaunchDarkly with the default configuration.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Closes the LaunchDarkly client event processing thread.

      Calculates the value of a feature flag for a given user.
      void sendEvent(java.lang.String eventName, LDUser user, com.google.gson.JsonObject data)

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • LDClient

        public LDClient(java.lang.String apiKey)
        Creates a new client instance that connects to LaunchDarkly with the default configuration. In most cases, you should use this constructor.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - the API key for your account

      • LDClient

        public LDClient(LDConfig config)
        Creates a new client to connect to LaunchDarkly with a custom configuration. This constructor can be used to configure advanced client features, such as customizing the LaunchDarkly base URL.
        Parameters:
        config - a client configuration object

    • Method Detail

      • sendEvent

        public void sendEvent(java.lang.String eventName,
             LDUser user,
             com.google.gson.JsonObject data)
        Tracks that a user performed an event.
        Parameters:
        eventName - the name of the event
        user - the user that performed the event
        data - a JSON object containing additional data associated with the event

      • getFlag

        public boolean getFlag(java.lang.String featureKey,
              LDUser user,
              boolean defaultValue)
        Calculates the value of a feature flag for a given user.
        Parameters:
        featureKey - the unique featureKey for the feature flag
        user - the end user requesting the flag
        defaultValue - the default value of the flag
        Returns:
        whether or not the flag should be enabled, or defaultValue if the flag is disabled in the LaunchDarkly control panel

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Closes the LaunchDarkly client event processing thread. This should only be called on application shutdown.
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.io.Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
